snippet: A group of big retailers, including 7-Eleven, Best Buy, CVS and Wal-Mart, are forming a company that will offer a way for customers to buy things with their smartphones.
abstract: Group of big retailers, including 7-Eleven, Best Buy, CVS and Wal-Mart, are forming a company that will offer a way for customers to buy things with their smartphones.
lead_paragraph: A group of big retailers, including 7-Eleven, Best Buy, CVS and Wal-Mart, are forming a company that will offer a way for customers to buy things with their smartphones.

headline.seo: Major Retailers Plan Mobile Payments Effort
headline.main: Big Retailers Plan Effort for Mobile Purchases
headline.print_headline: Big Retailers Plan Effort For Mobile Purchases
